resources.string: Confirm to remove all saved news
Confirm to clean all the data of the app
Must select at least ONE site
Must select at least ONE DAY
Oops… The app is awesome but yet it can\'t read this news.\nWhat do we do?
App must be restarted to apply changes
you CANNOT bookmark news until you grant permission
Without this permission, we CANNOT re-schedule the downloads after a phone restart
Developed by Rafael J. Lucena\nContact: rafaa89(at)gmail.com

Version 1.5.1 2016-07-08:
New publications: VilaWeb, Mashable.
Screen overlapping on navigation back fixed, plus coherence with drawer row selected.
 
Version 1.5.0 2016-07-01:
Dev mode integrated in Pro Codes.
Init screen to select your favorite sites.
Drawer list reconfigured.
 
Version 1.4.0 2016-06-25:
Marshmallow support!!
IMPORTANT FIX: Huge leak when closing news view fixed.
News display style improved (margins). Zoom disabled.
 
Version 1.3.0 2016-06-16:
Statistics improved.
Pro codes added.
New Pro feature: NewsUp Sports, follow your favorites sports (atm only football (soccer) supported)
About screen improved for better performance
Database bug fixed
 
Version 1.2.3 2016-06-02:
New: PRO version (atm enabled for everyone) will consume less data and battery, doing the hardest work in the server. Storage space consumed without limit?? Not anymore with the "Keep time" preference. Check it out at "Settings". Logs enabled/disabled easier for developing.
 
Version 1.2.2 2016-05-24:
Developer mode added with password for (only) developer features. Fixed error with categories.
 
Version 1.2.1 2016-05-17:
Restored support for 'Dagens Nyheter' and 'Discover'. 'Discover' sections updated. Fixed error with the news order in Read News. News html styles updated.
 
Version 1.2.0 2016-05-15:
New sites: 'Digital Camera', 'Verne' and 'Hipertextual'.
 
Version 1.1.0 2016-05-14:
New sites: 'Huffington Post USA' and 'Huffington Post Canada'. Check them out!
 
Version 1.0.7 2016-05-07:
Updated content management of 'Huffington Post Spain'. Added specific styles for each site (on development).
 
Version 1.0.3 2016-04-26:
All sections has been revised and many (not working) removed.
 
Version 1.0.2 2016-04-22:
Bugs fixed when updating RecyclerViewAdapter and server timeout increased to 10s.
 
Version 1.0.1 2016-04-21:
News in My news ordered by time even with multiply sites. Bugs fixed when updating RecyclerViewAdapter and when the server cannot answer one query.
 
Version 1.0.0 2016-04-19:
Lollipop support!!
Settings standardized.
Scheduled downloads now saved in DB
Minimum android version supported is now Kitkat

Preview on tap - like in Instagram 
New logo 
New look for list of news 
Improve display of news
